about_the_game:
BUILD YOUR VERY OWN ARCADE PLAYGROUND

  • Customize, clean and design your arcade layout
  • Complete tasks to reveal secret areas
  • Explore other people’s public arcades

PLAY OFFICIALLY LICENSED GAMES

  • Win tickets and redeem prizes
  • 10 ticket redemption games
  • 18 retro indie arcade games
  • Multiplayer up to 4 people

AXE-CITING ATTRACTIONS!

In addition to 6 lanes of ten-pin bowling, explore BATL Axe Throwing, the pioneers of the sport from the real world, now the first official axe throwing experience in VR. Unleash your inner lumberjack and compete with friends across 9 game modes, including a target so large it needs its own zipcode! You can even unlock 10 larger than life axes to take to BATL!

10 TICKET REDEMPTION ARCADE GAMES

  • Balloon Buster
  • Chicken Farm
  • HYPERpitch
  • HYPERshoot
  • Let's Bounce
  • Mega Color Match
  • Mega Spin
  • Prize Box
  • Speed of Light
  • Stacker

18 RETRO INDIE ARCADE GAMES

  • Banana Chase
  • Birds With Guns
  • Deer Santa
  • Distant Galaxy
  • Dominion Ex
  • Dragon's Playground
  • Froggy Road
  • Golf Sunday
  • Harold's Bad Day
  • Marble Merger
  • Pico Dino
  • Polar Panic
  • Pony 9000
  • RGB Zero
  • Scrap Boy
  • Stuck in the Sewers
  • Sub-Uber-Marine
  • Whiplash Taxi Co

Authentic recreations of award-winning arcade games with realistic physics and augmented effects, with even more officially licensed titles coming in the future!





  • Building and customizing your own arcade playground
  • Hanging out/socializing with friends
  • Playing officially licensed arcade games
  • Unlocking exciting attractions (bowling, anyone?)
  • Challenging other players and claiming the top spot on the leaderboards
  • Winning tickets and exchanging them for cool unique prizes
  • Customizing your own avatar
  • Retro futuristic, 80's inspired aesthetics
  • Hosting your own dance party (you control the jukebox)
  • Having fun in VR


If you like 8-10 points:
A no-brainer. You will definitely love this game!

If you like 7-5 points:
Knowing that you can customize your own experience and play games for free, we think you'll have a great time.

If you like 4-2 points:
We think it's worth giving it a try (you never know if you never try). It might just surprise you!

If you like 0-1 points:
Sorry, this game probably isn't for you. :(

name: Arcade Legend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR headset and controllers

short_description: Build and customize your own arcade while playing officially licensed arcade games! Bowl, throw axes, party with friends, and explore other arcades and venues in the city's growing entertainment hub!
